post.body: thanks for the follow. Look forward to seeing you at #LATechPaintball with @Lotay.
thanks for the follow. I'm relatively new on Twitter.
@Lotay has said kind things about you. I volunteer on the @BlackCardCircle Foundation as well.
do you have @LakersTickets for the Lakers home game against the Cleveland Cavaliers? Kobe vs. Lebron! Go Lakers!!!
thanks for the follow!
thank you for the LA Kings hockey tickets. Much appreciated.
#Travel @VegasVacation for luxury living in Las Vegas.
wow! That would be awesome. Mahalo and you rock! @Lotay @Paigecraig did you hear that?! #LATechPaintball
I nominate @LakersTickets for a Shorty Award in #sports because they have amazing VIP Lakers Tickets!
good morning. Nice to meet you on Twitter.
I nominate @Lotay for a Shorty Award in #nonprofits because http://www.causes.com/BlackCardCircleFoundation does great work!
I nominate @Lotay for a Shorty Award in #business because he is a professional, inspiring entrepreneur who cares about people.
I nominate @BlackCardCircle for a Shorty Award in #brand because http://www.BlackCardCircle.com is upscale, timeless & classy.
thanks for the follow. See you at #LATechPaintball Feb 8th (the day after BCCF's charity event) http://tinyurl.com/568slr
#TeamBlack !!! #LATechPaintball
Good morning! Any fun plans for the day?
count me in on #TeamBlack for #LATechPaintball.
other.
how do you keep up with all your Twitter followers and Facebook friends?!
good night.
I nominate @BCCF for a Shorty Award in #nonprofits because I personally see how hard all the dedicated @BCCF volunteers work.
I'm doing well. Working on @BlackCardCircle's sponsorship of the Black Tie @BCCF charity event with the Ritz-Carlton on Feb 7th.
no problem.
I nominate @BCCF for a Shorty Award in #nonprofits because Black Card Circle Foundation helps people fulfill their potential.
I nominate @Lotay for a Shorty Award in #business because @Lotay is a master of building legitimate, win-win relationships.
Good morning!
thank you for the shoutout from yesterday.
following your assistant @lanaatperrys now. :)
I nominate @BCCF for a Shorty Award in #nonprofits because Black Card Circle Foundation helps people fulfill their potential.
